TitlePage.Abstract: &Wedderga; package The title ``&Wedderga;'' stands for ``Wedderburn decomposition of a group algebras. This is a &GAP; package to compute primitive central idempotents and simple components of the Wedderburn decomposition of group algebras of finite groups over the field of rationals and over finite fields.
